text: Nicholas Georgescu-Roegen (born Nicolae Georgescu, 4 February 1906 â€“ 30 October 1994) was a Romanian American mathematician, statistician and economist. He was best known today for his 1971 magnum opus The Entropy Law and the Economic Process. He was a key figure in the creation of ecological economics.
